text.author: Dillard, Angel
text.title: United States v. Dillard, 835 F. Supp. 2d 1120, 1121-1122, 2011 U.S. Dist. LEXIS 148562, *2-5, 2011 WL 6719138 (D. Kan. December 21, 2011)
text.summary: In this threat letter, Angel Dillard admonishes Dr. Means for carrying out abortions at the Harry St. clinic in Wichita, which are portrayed as killing children, arguing that other physicians will avoid associating with Dr. Means, and invoking the threat of a car bomb, picketing at home and at the office, loss of clientele and staff, as well as religious objections to abortion.
